actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Health and Human Services Department, OMB.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to eliminate certain requirements with respect to colored oleomargarine.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to eliminate specified margarine labeling and restaurant notice requirements.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to eliminate certain requirements with respect to colored oleomargarine.
